*************
coords.angsep
*************

.. currentmodule:: astrolib.coords

Angular separation between two `~position.Position`.

Can be defined by hand, or produced by "subtracting" two positions.
Like `~position.Position`, it will have an internal representation,
and a variety of user-selected representations.

.. automodule:: astrolib.coords.angsep
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
